text: Toys is a 1992 fantasy dark-comedy movie directed by Barry Levinson. It stars Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack, Robin Wright, LL Cool J, and Jamie Foxx. It was released on December 18, 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Toys (VG) from Gamespot Category:1992 fantasy movies Category:1990s American fantasy movies Category:1990s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Drone movies Category:Movies set in factories Category:Movies set in Washington (state) Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Barry Levinson Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Toys (movie)
